title: Close button moves down when view resized smaller
description: When a view like the Navigator is resized smaller on Linux with build 20011127 (does not happen on build 20011116 on Nt2000), the tool items move below the label.
OB: When resizing the Navigator view smaller, the tool items move below the label on Linux with build 20011127.
EB: When resizing the Navigator view smaller, the close button should remain in the correct position regardless of the build or operating system.
SR:
1. Open the Navigator view.
2. Resize the view to a smaller size on Linux with build 20011127.
3. Notice that the tool items move below the label.
